n = int(input())
l = list(map(int,input().split()))
k = 0
while l[k] == l[-1]:
	k+=1
m = len(l)-1-k
k = len(l)-1
while l[k] == l[0]:
	k-=1
m = max(m, k)
print(m)

n = int(input())

colors = list(map(int, input().split()))

left = 0
right = n - 1
while colors[left] == colors[right]:
    left += 1

left_answer = right - left


left = 0
right = n - 1
while colors[left] == colors[right]:
    right -= 1

right_answer = right - left

print(max(left_answer, right_answer))

n=int(input())
l1=list(map(int,input().split()))
x=0
y=n-1
a=0
b=n-1
while l1[x]==l1[y] and l1[a]==l1[b]:
    y-=1
    a+=1
print(y-x)

N = int(input())

A = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0

l = 0
r = N - 1

while True:
    if A[l] != A[r]:
        ans = r - l
        break
    l += 1
l, r = 0, N - 1
while True:
    if A[l] != A[r]:
        ans = max(ans, r - l)
        break
    r -= 1
print(ans)

n = int(input())
colors = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
right = n - 1
left = 0
while colors[right] == colors[0]:
    right -= 1

while colors[left] == colors[-1]:
	left += 1

print(max(n - left - 1, right))

n = int(input())
c = list(map(int, input().split()))

l, r = 0, n-1
while c[l] == c[-1]:
    l += 1
while c[r] == c[0]:
    r -= 1

print(max(r, n-1-l))

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
l = a[0]
r = a[-1]
k = 0
while (a[k] == a[-1]):
  k += 1


r = 0
while (a[n - r - 1] == a[0]):
  r += 1

print(max(n - k - 1, n - r - 1))
